ygData.subject: Re: Enchanters Research components
ygData.msgSnippet: ... at ... you ... Translation on the dark elf word: spam --to group with someone to form a party. Very important in learning other languages.  You must be
ygData.messageBody:
> Your trainer should have some of the other languages now. They appeared
at
> my trainer after I got research. Train it up a few points (or a lot if
you
> saved points like I did) and then find a buddy.
>
> Spam your buddy in that language (you can put up to 5 lines of text in a
> social) when s/he stops learning ... zone

Translation on the dark elf word: "spam"
--to group with someone to form a party.

Very important in learning other languages. You must be grouped with the
person that is speaking the language you want to know. =)

-Me
